roleset.name: advanced, refined

role.descr: aspect/domain of arg1 that is sophisticated (if in addition)

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5.

example.name: arg1
example.text: That show was , for its time -LRB- 1962 - 68 -RRB- , sophisticated and realistic , compared to stuff like " The Man From U.N.C.L.E. " and " The Saint " which frequently bordered on the goofy .
example.arg: compared to stuff like " The Man From U.N.C.L.E. " and " The Saint " which frequently bordered on the goofy
